Notifications.Name: User Password Changed
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a change is made to your account password.

Notifications.Name: User Profile Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a change is made to your account profile.

Notifications.Name: New Mention in Notes
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when you are mentioned in a note.

Notifications.Name: Quote Approval Request
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a quote approval request is sent to you.

Notifications.Name: Quote Approved
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a quote is approved.

Notifications.Name: Credit App Completed
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent to the user who sent the credit application link to a customer and is subsequently completed.
